name: Build a Professional Website with WordPress.com
seo_title: Wordpress Online Training Course | Learn from Fiverr
seo_description: Learn how to build a customised and fully SEO optimised website with Wordpress using highly functional widgets, plugins and easy to learn SEO strategies
description: Discover how to build a website, add content pages & blog posts, select & customize a theme, add widgets & plugins to expand your site's features, connect to your social networks & upload media including videos & images - all without having to code!
